title: Bug: Show connection page after an error if the pane it's autohided
author: NetVicious
body_snippet:
<!-- Bug -->
Hi!
I have the notifications pane unpinned/autohided like a statusbar.

When I get a connection error, like trying to connect with RDP to a non-existent server, the focus on mRemoteNG it's changed to the notifications pane (I see the blue bottom bar of being active) but the pane it's now show, it remains hided.

This worked on 1.72, the pane opened letting me to see the error. I think the problem should be in the code change from Visual Basic to C#

Regards,

|--:|---|
|O...
